alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 4:40AM AKST until December 26 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FROM TALKEETNA SOUTHWARD... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain with significant icing possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches possible. Ice accumulations of up to one quarter inch possible. * WHERE...Susitna Valley from Talkeetna Southward. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be extremely hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel on Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light snow are likely Saturday through Saturday night. Snow will then transition from snow to freezing rain during the day Sunday from south to north. Precipitation will then likely transition back to snow Sunday evening. Precipitation to the north of Talkeetna is expected to remain all snow throughout this event.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
